thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay and Fantastic Staff
thread.title_full: Great Stay and Fantastic Staff - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 357Matt
title: Great Stay and Fantastic Staff
text: I stayed at this hotel twice in January and February for 35 days in total on business from the UK. Location is fantastic but the staff were what made it so enjoyable. Big thanks to Serge who was so helpful and friendly and the front desk staff. Elizabeth from housekeeping was amazing and so helpful and friendly as were all the cleaning staff at the hotel and the rooms were kept spotless. O"Daly and Ronnie in the bar were outstanding and made my stay so enjoyable. Strongly recommend anyone visiting New York to stay here. Big thanks to everyone for making me so welcome.
